title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Up for grabs are 9x 2022 Lealana Bitcents, regular silver coins.Each coin is loaded with face value of 0.01BTC and has been graded by ICG.They also come with a COA that has the complete address.Funding transaction for all 9 coins: https://mempool.space/tx/db2e7acbe0a8881f7a8df17579a5bb42907d2041fa0fc96b273bc1bfee8091deLOT 1: #104 MS69PLLOT 2: #169 MS69PLLOT 3: #171 MS69PLLOT 4: #183 MS69PLLOT 5: #185 MS69PLLOT 6: #195 MS69PLLOT 7: #217 MS69PLLOT 8: #236 MS69PLLOT 9: #267 MS68PLSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0140MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 30th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: bc1q0mj9njt50045qfuzewc4rut7su7cvg8nt89j3cSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
